means: 缠结在一起( intertwine的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In his mind, religion and politics were inseparably intertwined.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他心中，宗教与政治是密不可分地交织在一起的。
她与他的命运纠缠在一起。
他们的命运交织在一起。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Cognitive Linguistics: An Introduction... ... roe 獐, 獐鹿 intertwined 交织在一起 any 任何.
he intertwined his fingers with hers ., 他用手指勾著她的手指.
Nuclear size effects are intertwined with nuclear force effects ., 原子核大小的影响与核力的影响纠缠在一起.
Business , politics and the media hopelessly intertwined in France in recent years ., 近些年来 , 商业 , 政治和传媒无可救药地交织纠缠在一起.

list.abs: the intertwined strategies of mitigation and adaptation will be the topics of future columns .减轻压力与适应灾变的种种策略，将会是本专栏未来的议题。
among other things , the crisis has underscored the intertwining of public and private debt in europe .此外，危机也凸显出了欧洲的公私债务交错的问题。
Environmental law heavily intertwined with administrative law ., 环保与行政法紧密纠缠在一起.
...l lamina，细胞突起（processes）且互相交织（intertwining processes），细胞间存在大量的胶原纤维。

entry.def: If two or more things are intertwined or intertwine, they are closely connected with each other in many ways.

example.tran: 他们的命运交织在一起。

example.ex: Three major narratives intertwine within Foucault's text, 'Madness and Civilisation'...
example.tran: 3个主要故事在福柯的《疯癫与文明》一书当中密切相联。

entry.def: If two things intertwine, they are twisted together or go over and under each other.

example.ex: Trees, undergrowth and creepers intertwined, blocking our way...
example.tran: 树木、灌木丛与藤蔓植物盘根错节,挡住了我们的去路。

example.ex: The towels were embroidered with their intertwined initials.
example.tran: 毛巾上绣着他们姓名首字母的连写组合。

auth_sentence.content: Truth and falsehood were inextricably intertwined in that statement.
auth_sentence.res_content: Truth and falsehood were inextricably intertwined in that statement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Truth and falsehood were inextricably intertwined in that statement.

auth_sentence.content: Frankly, health care and politics are inextricably intertwined.
auth_sentence.res_content: Frankly, health care and politics are inextricably intertwined.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Frankly, health care and politics are inextricably intertwined.

auth_sentence.content: Cortical expansion and skill learning seemed to be deeply intertwined.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cortical expansion and skill learning seemed to be deeply intertwined.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cortical expansion and skill learning seemed to be deeply intertwined.
